(Scratch that, i didn't read that other post right. Let me repost 
that.) 

::Battera::

She looked back to see how Vulois was doing. She was suffering from 
an extremly short temper today. "OK. I've had enough. First he slaps 
me, pushes me around. And I can't take it any more.  No more miss 
nice bat." She turned and headed for the canyons. She went into a 
nose dive and pulled up at the last second, coasting only a few feet 
off the canyon floor. She swung and glided in and out of the rock 
structures. She skimmed her wings along a small pond and the rose a 
few more feet.  She then made a sharp turn and quickly ducked into a 
cave.  She flew up into the ceiling of the cave and hung, upside down 
on a stalagtite.  She wrapped her wings around her and hid in the 
dark of the cave.
